abstract: The acquisition of Power-One could prove to be a smart one, the author contends. For one, ABB should also be able to reap cost savings and extra sales, by plugging Power-One into its global network.

lead_paragraph: ABB’s contrarian push into solar energy looks smart. The Swiss group is buying Nasdaq-listed Power-One for $1 billion in cash – a fully priced deal, given the solar industry’s current financial misery. But ABB insists Power-One occupies a sweet spot. That sounds plausible, and long term, the deal should add up.
